name: Graveler
flavorText:
Rolls down slopes
to move. It rolls
over any obstacle without slowing
or changing its
direction.

previous.name: Geodude
previous.flavorText:
Found in fields
and mountains.
Mistaking them for boulders,
people often step
or trip on them.

next.name: Golem
next.flavorText:
Its boulder-like
body is extremely
hard. It can easily withstand
dynamite blasts
without damage.
